title: Justice (Engagement of Children in Criminal Activity) Act 2024 (No. 8 of 2024)
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Criminal Justice (Engagement of Children
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Criminal Justice (Engagement of Children 

in Criminal Activity) Act 2024 (Commencement) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited criminal justice (engagement child criminal activity) act 2024 (commencement) order 2024

title: Justice (Engagement of Children in Criminal Activity) Act 2024 (No. 8 of 2024)
heading: 2. The 24th day of May 2024 is appointed as the day on which the Criminal
text_raw:
2. The 24th day of May 2024 is appointed as the day on which the Criminal 
Justice (Engagement of Children in Criminal Activity) Act 2024 (No. 8 of 2024) 
shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

21 May, 2024. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 
Minister for Justice. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 24th May, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [232] 3
